name: English Computerized Learning
overview:
English Computerized Learning Inc. (ECL) was founded in 1995 in Edmonton, Alberta, Canada. ECL operates as a developer and distributor of professional high quality, interactive, multimedia ESL/EFL CALL materials.

ECL’s mandate is to address the world-wide demand for English pronunciation tools and quality ESL materials. ECL develops professional quality, interactive and user friendly multimedia ESL products delivered by CD-ROM or the internet. Their focus is to allow English learners, with basic computer skills, to easily use and successfully benefit from their products.

The curriculum and content of ECL products are developed by ESL/EFL teachers and professional linguists. Knowledge of effective learning strategies and expertise in software development are all part of the skill set of the development team at English Computerized Learning Inc.

Pronunciation Power 2, their original award winning flagship product, is now used and recommended by over 4000 universities, colleges, businesses and schools worldwide.
